items.summary: Replace the existing teacher profile image for Santanu Sir in the Teachers component (frontend/src/components/Teachers.tsx) with the newly uploaded photo 'image (2)-5.jpg' showing him in a white patterned shirt with a mustache speaking at a microphone with decorative background including silver streamers and floral wall decorations
